original_text: Then the soldiers fixed Jesus onto the cross. They took his clothes for themselves. They played a game to find out who would receive each piece of his clothes.
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 십자가에 못 박은 후에 그 옷을 제비 뽑아 나누고

sentences.original_text: Then the soldiers fixed Jesus onto the cross.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 군인들은 예수를 십자가에 못 박았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They took his clothes for themselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 옷을 자기들 것으로 가져갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: to find out who would receive each piece of his clothes.
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그의 옷 각 조각을 받을지 알아보기 위해서였습니다.
